entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .editorconfig "Value cannot be null. Parameter name: path" at Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.EditorConfigSettings.Extensions.SolutionExtensions.<>c.<G #58732
  • C# code formatting is not respecting .editorconfig #58731

Closed

  • IDE0161 Code Fix Deleting Content #58726
  • A possible easy solution to not build docs-only changes on CI #58710
  • Developers can maintain and modify their code #58270
    Backlog
  • Developers can maintain consistent code by defining coding conventions #58273
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix empty strings in ThrowHelper #58733
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions #58730
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58729
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Don't run CI for docs-only changes #58723
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Remove implicit conversion from string to `ReadOnlySpan<T>` from test source for `ReadOnlySpan<T>`. #58724
    Area-Compilers, Test-Scenario, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1541625 #58721

Updated

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #58737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #58736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve syntax diffing of similar nodes #38016
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, Community
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • Use ReadOnlySpan properties over array fields #56845
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.1
  • Better parse when lambda expressions contain default parameter values. #58690
    Area-Compilers
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers, Feature - Param Null Checking
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Remove contract check to avoid crash #58675
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P3
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Required modifier parsing #58431
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Minor simplification in EnC #58728
    Area-Interactive
  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from TypeScript and F# Inline Rename interfaces #58381
    Area-IDE
  • Rename and share CompilerAnalyzerConfigOptions #58579
    Area-Analyzers
